title: Lease Buyout Quote Request
description: A customer nearing the end of their lease wants to know the cost to purchase their vehicle.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their active lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the customer's lease contract details.

tasks.description: Calculate the lease buyout amount based on the residual value, remaining payments, and any applicable fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the precise buyout amount.

tasks.description: Provide the buyout quote to the customer and explain the steps to complete the purchase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the quote and the process for titling and registration.
